category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ChangeItemRevision_Design_Item_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation through which design components and design item revisions are attached to Change Item Revision for design impact analysis. The specified relation becomes the default relation which will be used to generate design context from Change Item Revision. Valid values are CMHasProblemItem, CMHasImpactedItem and CMReferences. The default value is "CMHasImpactedItem".
